document.full_text: jury selection began on friday in the trial of mark kerrigan, u.s. olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan's brother, who is charged with manslaughter in the death of his 70-year-old father.
document.title: trial begins for brother of olympic skater nancy kerrigan
lines_and_colors: jury selection began on friday in the trial of mark kerrigan, u.s. olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan's brother, who is charged with manslaughter in the death of his 70-year-old father.
